title: Rip screen
body: ok so iam very new to LoL and would love to play it, but when i join a game iam supper zoomed in. Now i have tryed windows and boarderless mode but i still cant see my ui/ hud. and i really want need help b/c i want to play.

replies.body: Can you snap a screenshot and upload it to [Imgur](https://imgur.com/) or [Gyazo](https://gyazo.com/)? I'm also interested to see what both your System and In-game display resolutions are set to.
